forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the atmosphere bears the character of a cool, mostly sunny day, yet a gentle veil of haziness can be felt, hinting at the presence of fleeting clouds. The temperature dances around the mid-fifties, a temperate embrace that may encourage residents to venture outside, though many will find the brisk west winds whispering reminders to dress warmly. With gusts potentially reaching eighteen miles per hour, it would be wise to don a light jacket, perhaps wrapped around a favorite sweater, perfect for strolling through the quiet neighborhoods or along the waterfront.

As evening settles in, the clouds will deepen slightly, transitioning into a partly cloudy night, with a low dipping to the mid-forties. This forecast suggests a serene dusk, ideal for a quiet evening stroll or perhaps stopping by a cozy café for a warm drink. While the signature San Francisco fog has yet to fully claim the day, its subtle presence in the distance hints at the transition the city so often embraces. Anticipate a brisk, refreshing ambiance, conducive to reflective moments amidst the bustling city life.
